com.koverse.sdk.source

Class ImportSourceMapper<KEYIN,VALUEIN,KEYOUT,VALUEOUT>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.koverse.sdk.source.ImportSourceMapper<KEYIN,VALUEIN,KEYOUT,VALUEOUT>
  • Type Parameters:
    KEYIN - The type of the input key
    VALUEIN - The type of the input value
    KEYOUT - The type of the output key
    VALUEOUT - The type of the output value

    public abstract class ImportSourceMapper<KEYIN,VALUEIN,KEYOUT,VALUEOUT>
extends Object
    A simple wrapper around the vanilla hadoop mapper, with added KoverseContext setup.

    • Method Detail

      • setContext

        public abstract void setContext(MapReduceSourceContext context)
        Called just before setup(), this method is used to pass a Koverse related context to the mapper. The mapper can use this context to interact with Koverse and the data store - for record output, etc.
        Parameters:
        context - The context used to write Koverse records, etc.

      • setup

        public abstract void setup(org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Mapper.Context context)
                    throws IOException,
                           InterruptedException
        Setup, called for map(java.lang.Object, java.lang.Object, org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Mapper.Context).
        Parameters:
        context - The context
        Throws:
        IOException - on error
        InterruptedException - on error

      • map

        public abstract void map(KEYIN key,
                         VALUEIN value,
                         org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Mapper.Context context)
                  throws IOException,
                         InterruptedException
        Map a single key and value pair. Called 0 or more times after setup(org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Mapper.Context).
        Parameters:
        key - The key
        value - The value
        context - The context
        Throws:
        IOException - on error
